directions: In a punch bowl whisk together the molasses and the ginger, whisk in the milk, the half-and-half, the rum, the brandy, and chill the punch, covered, for at least four hours, or until it is very cold. Serve the punch in punch glasses and sprinkle it with the nutmeg.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons ground ginger, or to taste
Garnish: freshly grated nutmeg for sprinkling the punch
title: Molasses, Rum, and Ginger Milk Punch
